summary: The implementation adds comprehensive admin role management with owner and configurable admins. Backend implements owner Principal, admin set with persistent storage, access control functions, and query endpoints. Frontend adds Admin Management UI with admin list display, add/remove forms, and React Query hooks. All requirements appear to be implemented with evidence across backend/main.mo, frontend AdminPage, and useQueries hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend/migration.mo file with migration logic for state management
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration file and state migration logic were not requested in the BuildRequest. The BuildRequest focused on admin role management features, not upgrade migration infrastructure.
Changes to MarketDiscussion.tsx were not part of the admin role management requirements. This component handles market comments, not admin functionality.
Changes to SendTokenForm.tsx were not requested. This component handles token transfers and wallet functionality, which is outside the scope of admin role management.
Changes to WalletPage.tsx were not part of the admin role management requirements. Wallet functionality is unrelated to admin/owner features.
